price: Ṣé kò hàn sí wọn pé mélòó mélòó nínú àwọn ìran tí A ti parun ṣíwájú wọn, tí (àwọn wọ̀nyí náà) sì ń rìn kọjá ní ibùgbé wọn! Dájúdájú àwọn àmì wà nínú ìyẹn fún àwọn olóye.
arabic: أَفَلَمۡ يَهۡدِ لَهُمۡ كَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَبۡلَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡقُرُونِ يَمۡشُونَ فِي مَسَٰكِنِهِمۡۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّأُوْلِي ٱلنُّهَىٰ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: afalam yahdi lahum kam ahlaknā qablahum mina al-qurūni yamshūna fī masākinihim inna fī dhālika laāyātin li-ulī al-nuhā
